    • Method Detail

      • setLoot

        public static void setLoot(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
           java.lang.String phatLootName,
           boolean add,
           java.lang.String collName,
           Loot loot)
        Adds/Removes a Loot to the specified PhatLoot
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender modifying the PhatLoot
        phatLootName - The name of the PhatLoot to be modified or null to indicate all linked PhatLoots
        add - True the Loot will be added, false if it will be removed
        collName - The name of the collection if any
        loot - The Loot that will be added/removed

      • getPhatLoots

        public static java.util.LinkedList<PhatLoot> getPhatLoots(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                          java.lang.String name)
        Returns the a LinkedList of PhatLoots. If a name is provided then only the PhatLoot with the given name will be in the List. If no name is provided then each PhatLoot that is linked to the target Block will be in the List
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender targeting a Block
        name - The name of the PhatLoot to be found
        Returns:
        The a LinkedList of PhatLoots

      • getPercent

        public static double getPercent(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                java.lang.String string)
        Retrieves a double value from the given string that ends with %
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender that will receive error messages
        string - The String that contains the percent
        Returns:
        The double value or -1 if the percent was invalid
